nodes.text: anybody heard that the city of san fransisco is talking about banning the ownership of guns by anybody other than police in the city limits. if so, how true is it and how do you think it will stand up to the constitution?

I believe I read this in the paper a few days ago, but I think the ban will be similiar to DC's in that it will ban handgun ownership. As for the constitutionality of this? Since when have the Gun Grabbers ever worried about the Constitution?
